title: New Product Development Project-Based Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific principles and understanding of engineering design processes
context.additional_context: Application of real-time collaboration and project management tools using digital devices

learning_goals: The creative new product development process, considering sustainability, can be explained in three or more stages.
In a project-based learning environment, learners can collaborate with team members to complete a new product prototype.
Learners can submit product design proposals incorporating advanced technologies (3D modeling, IoT, etc.).
The decision-making process at each stage of new product development can be analyzed based on data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
